attributes.action: Create a skatepark in Invergordon, Ross and Cromarty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We skateboarders, bladers and bikers infact teenagers in general have nothing to do with our spare time. We would like a place where we can skateboard etc without bothering any local residents. We are not all hoody thugs, in fact we are mainly the opposite trying to do something with our lives.
